Key Match Events: Tommy Pham hit a tiebreaking, three-run home run in the fourth inning
Seth Lugo allowed one run and five hits in seven innings
Pre-Game Insights: Matt Quatraro returned after missing two games following the death of his mother
Royals manager Matt Quatraro said it was a relief to have someone come through after a season-high, seven-game losing streak
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro said it was nice to tie it up and see Pham’s big hit
Pham expressed relief that he finally hit a big home run after a tough stretch
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul DeJong reached on an infield single
Robbie Grossman singled for his first Royals hit since being claimed from Texas
Michael Massey hit a tying single
Others: José Ramírez put Cleveland ahead 1-0 in the third with a two-out bloop single
Kris Bürnberg struck out the side in the eighth
Lucas Erceg worked a 1-2-3 ninth for his ninth save and sixth with the Royals
